name: Mario in Some Usual Day
overview: Mario in Some Usual Day is one of those Mario hacks that has the feel of a brand new game or a sequel to SMB 3. The author, JASP, did a fantastic job when creating this game.  Featuring an automatic save feature that saves your progress at the end of each world completed and a brand new Star Coin collection system.  You have to find special Star coins in the levels to be able to access the final world of the game.  New enemies and enemies that you will recognize from other games makes this game feel like it'll be one of those classics that you'll be playing for years to come.
